ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Stacking DOTS
ygData.msgSnippet: Yet ANOTHER char.. Stack em on yourself.  That allows you to see which stack, and the dmg they do.  Careful not to kill yourself in the process though. ... be
ygData.messageBody:
Yet ANOTHER char..

Stack 'em on yourself. That allows you to see which stack, and the dmg they
do. Careful not to kill yourself in the process though.



> From: "John Chiodo" <chiodo@...>
>
> I am level 18 and using the lvl 16 spells. My
> question is out of all the DOT types spells which
> ones stack? I am using blood boil, leech, engulfing
> darkness and heart flutter. How can I tell if they are
> stacking or canceling one another? With new spells coming
> soon my spell bar is already crowded.
>
> The only thing I have read is engulfing darkness and
> blood boil stack? but I'm not sure.
>
> Ommin
> lvl 18 Erudite Necro
> E`ci
>
>
